content.rendered:
On Monday 18 January, the results of our 2015-16 Video Competition were announced to schools and science clubs.

Congratulations to all those that entered the competition.  The standard was exceptionally high this year and our judges had a challenge on their hands deciding which teams should be successful in reaching the Finals.

The winners listed below have all secured places at the UK Finals to be held at Imperial College London on Saturday 19 and Sunday 20 March 2016.  Also listed below are teams that have secured places on the reserve list, and entries that have received an honourable mention from the judges.

If you are interested in being in the audience for the UK Finals presentations on Sunday 20 March 2016, please contact Jen Greenwood (j.greenwood@uksdc.org)  by Friday 11 March 2016.

Video Competition Winners
Alberg Science Club – Alberg Solutions
Bede’s Senior School – Metafora Delivery Systems
Bishop Stortford’s College – Altus Space Innovation
Craigmount High School – Astromechanics
Henrietta Barnett School – Andromeda
High School of Glasgow – Sedna
Pates Grammar School – Pates SciCom
Royal Grammar School Newcastle – Project HaDeS
St Paul’s School – Tensegrity
Westminster School – Westminster Space Agency

Reserve List with Honourable Mention
Howard of Effingham – HOEST – Howard of Effingham Space Team
Nonsuch High School for Girls – NASA: Nonsuch’s Amazing Space Agency
Riddlesdown Collegiate – Riddlesdown Science
Stokesley School – NOSS
The Green School – Aristaeus

Honourable Mention
City of London Academy – CoLA
Clitheroe Royal Grammar School – CRGS Engineering Society
Felsted School – Shuttlecocks
Nonsuch High School for Girls – Europa
St Paul’s School – The Abyss Institute
St Paul’s School – Project Arcturus
